question: Gaurvi Singhvi, who became the world’s youngest open water swimmer to cross the English Channel, is from which district of Rajasthan?
explanation: Gaurvi Singhvi (16) from Udaipur has made India proud by becoming the world’s youngest open water swimmer to cross the English Channel in 13 hours and 26 minutes in August 2019. The Channel is a water body that separates southern England from northern France and links southern part of North Sea to the Atlantic Ocean.
